Activity: Log in to the system, check emails for urgent requests or updates. Review yesterday's build status and bug reports from @qtest-1.
Review the design document provided by @ldes-1 regarding core game mechanics. Make notes on potential technical challenges and areas needing clarification.

Meet with @ldes-1 and @sdes-1 to discuss the design document. Focus on clarifying ambiguities in the movement, combat, and interaction mechanics. Send email to @ldes-1, @sdes-1 on the clarification points @PEOPLE
Begin implementing the base character movement system. Focus on basic locomotion (walking, running, jumping). Write unit tests for each movement state.
Continue implementing character movement system. Add basic camera control and ensure smooth transitions between movement states.

Integrate the basic character movement with the physics engine. Experiment with different physics settings (gravity, friction, etc.) to achieve the desired feel. Consult with @sdes-2 on the impact of different parameters in game play.

Document the character movement system, including code structure, key variables, and limitations. Prepare a preliminary document for other programmers and upload to internal document server. Check code in.
